name: Public hearings required
text: §323D-17  Public hearings required.  In the preparation of the state health services and facilities plan or amendments to the state health services and facilities plan, the state agency and the statewide council shall conduct a public hearing on the proposed plan or the amendments and shall comply with the provisions for notice of public hearings in chapters 91 and 92. [L 1975, c 159, pt of §2; ren and am L 1977, c 178, pt of §2; am L 1980, c 75, §7; am L 1982, c 245, §5; am L 1987, c 270, §7]
